author: gabrielaxel
title: DAOJob: The HR Tooling for DAOs
description: As the DAO space grows, so does the need for contributors. Current job boards have limited reach and aren't optimized for DAO operations.
solution: DAOJob is a DAO-native task & job board that seamlessly integrates with Web2 distribution channels.
experience: PhD in neuroscience & decentralized tech ethics, ex-Head of HR (SingualrityNET); 15 years of venture-building & corporate development.
